pageProps.title: numerizer
pageProps.teaser: Convert natural language numerics into ints and floats.

data.title: numerizer
data.slogan: Convert natural language numerics into ints and floats.
data.description: A SpaCy extension for Docs, Spans and Tokens that converts numerical words and quantitative named entities into numeric strings.
code_example: nlp = load('en_core_web_sm') # or any other model
doc = nlp('The Hogwarts Express is at platform nine and three quarters')
data.author: Jaidev Deshpande
